enWisdom: Renunciation of worldly pleasures is a quality of the sincere
Renunciation of worldly pleasures is the key to goodness
Renunciation of worldly pleasures is the attribute of the God-wary and the quality of the repentant
The best act of worship is renouncing worldly pleasures
The best [act of] obedience is renunciation of worldly pleasures

Wisdom: أَحَقُّ النَّاسِ بِالزَّهَادَةِ مَنْ عَرَفَ نَقْصَ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: The one who is most deserving of renouncing worldly pleasures is he who knows the flaws of this world

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الزُّهْدِ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْإِيمَانِ وَ[حُسْنُ‏] الرَّغْبَةِ فِي الدُّنْيَا تُفْسِدُ الْإِيقَانَ
enWisdom: Complete renunciation of worldly pleasures is from the best [act of] faith while desire for this world corrupts conviction

Wisdom: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ زَهِدَتْ نَفْسُهُ وَقَلَّتْ رَغْبَتُهُ وَمَاتَتْ شَهْوَتُهُ وَخَلَصَ إِيمَانُهُ وَصَدَقَ إِيقَانُهُ
enWisdom: The best person is one whose soul is uninterested in worldly pleasures, whose desire is less, whose lust is dead, whose faith is pure and whose certitude is true
The foundation of generosity is renunciation of worldly pleasures
The embellishment of wisdom is being uninterested in the pleasures of this world
Espouse the renunciation of worldly pleasures, for indeed it helps the religion
The excellence of the intellect is [in] indifference towards [the pleasures of] this world

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ الدُّنْيَا أَنْ يَزْهَدَ فِيهَا وَيَعْزُفَ عَنْهَا
enWisdom: It behoves the one who recognizes this world to renounce its pleasures and to turn away from it
